item.title: First Post!
item.description: Hi! This is my first post!

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, I am Sayak Dattagupta, and I am currently a 12th grader who is passionate about programming, mathematics, physics and problem solving in general. This is my blog, which I have set up using Hugo and Github Pages (so as to bypass any hosting costs). The theme that I have used is hugo-xmin, which has LaTeX supoort right out of the gate (as demonstrated in the homepage) and is extremely light (150 lines). I cannot recommend it enough.
